title: Resolve Comments
description: Change content based on the comment suggestions and then remove comments.
context:
Preserve the received DITA XML content as it is, remove the comments inside it which have this style:
<?oxy_comment_start author="AI Positron" comment="COMMENT_HERE"?>DESCRIBED_CONTENT<?oxy_comment_end?>
Also change the content to match the comment suggestion which is removed.

examples.prompt: This is problems to consider.
